item.title: Mentioned by CottageCountryNow.ca
item.description:
Clement defends Harper's move to prorogue
Parry Sound-Muskoka MP Tony Clement said that was not the case. "It's typical for governments to do a speech from the throne when they've completed their legislative agenda," said Clement, adding that about 37 bills were passed in the last session of ...

item.title: Mentioned by CottageCountryNow.ca
item.description:
Updated: Laureen Harper visits SPCA
MP Tony Clement welcomed Mrs. Harper as the two of them met volunteers in the area. "She has taken two days out of her busy schedule to be here in Muskoka to celebrate one of the things that makes Muskoka special, and that's our volunteers," said ...

item.title: Mentioned by CottageCountryNow.ca
item.description:
Laureen Harper Salutes Volunteers
She was joined by MP Tony Clement as they saluted volunteers on board the RMS Segwun. This is the second day of her visit to the area. Before going to the wharf, the two stopped by the animal shelter in Bracebridge and yesterday they spent the afternoon ...

item.description:

ByMandi Hargrave. MUSKOKA â€“ Parry Sound-Muskoka MP Tony Clement will be making various pit stops in Muskoka over the next two days with Laureen Harper. The two learned how to paddle board outside Algonquin Outfitters on the Muskoka River today ...

item.title: Mentioned by CottageCountryNow.ca
item.description:
Shuffle shrinks MP's portfolio
MUSKOKA - Parry Sound Muskoka MP Tony Clement continues as the president of the Treasury Board though his portfolio was downsized in the cabinet shuffle on Monday. "I'm very pleased the prime minister has expressed his confidence in me," Clement ...
